## Description

A collection of functions
related to the multivariate normal distribution.

## Installation

You can install the released version of `multiNorm` from [GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/multiNorm) with:

```r
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/multiNorm")
```

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/multiNorm/index.html)
for package documentation.
